description:
A versatile, lightweight dress that works over your bikini on the way to the beach or dressed up for dinner. Made from an airy blend recycled polyester and spandex, the Fleetwith Dress is stretchy, dries quickly and resists wrinkles.

  • Lightweight recycled polyester and spandex blend
  • DWR finish sheds dirt and spills
  • Draped waist has an encased drawcord for a customizable fit
  • 2 front hand pockets and a hidden zippered pocket
  • Shirttail hem gives the dress a playful movement
  • Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
name: Patagonia Fleetwith Dress - Women's
